I believe my VB program that smoothes a whole map is finally 
debugged!!  However, I need to know which scenarios would be good ones 
to test it out on.  (I've already tested it on the brag, #116).  I've 
already attached a couple of extra functions to the program: a map 
decoder (I'm going to work on the output) and a map copier (always 
nice).

Once I get the output for the decoder to my enjoyment, I'll work on 
adding an encoder function. (An encoder function without a smooth 
program is utterly stupid).
